00013     public static class ImagingFactory

00015         private static IImagingFactory factory;
00016 
00017         public static IImagingFactory GetImaging()
00018         {
00019             if (factory == null)
00020             {
00021                 factory = (IImagingFactory)Activator.CreateInstance(Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(new Guid("327ABDA8-072B-11D3-9D7B-0000F81EF32E")));
00022             }
00023 
00024             return factory;
00025         }

00029     // Pulled from gdipluspixelformats.h in the Windows Mobile 5.0 Pocket PC SDK
00030     public enum PixelFormatID : int
00031     {
00032         PixelFormatIndexed = 0x00010000, // Indexes into a palette
00033         PixelFormatGDI = 0x00020000, // Is a GDI-supported format
00034         PixelFormatAlpha = 0x00040000, // Has an alpha component
00035         PixelFormatPAlpha = 0x00080000, // Pre-multiplied alpha
00036         PixelFormatExtended = 0x00100000, // Extended color 16 bits/channel
00037         PixelFormatCanonical = 0x00200000,
00038 
00039         PixelFormatUndefined = 0,
00040         PixelFormatDontCare = 0,
00041 
00042         PixelFormat1bppIndexed = (1 | (1 << 8) | PixelFormatIndexed | PixelFormatGDI),
00043         PixelFormat4bppIndexed = (2 | (4 << 8) | PixelFormatIndexed | PixelFormatGDI),
00044         PixelFormat8bppIndexed = (3 | (8 << 8) | PixelFormatIndexed | PixelFormatGDI),
00045         PixelFormat16bppRGB555 = (5 | (16 << 8) | PixelFormatGDI),
00046         PixelFormat16bppRGB565 = (6 | (16 << 8) | PixelFormatGDI),
00047         PixelFormat16bppARGB1555 = (7 | (16 << 8) | PixelFormatAlpha | PixelFormatGDI),
00048         PixelFormat24bppRGB = (8 | (24 << 8) | PixelFormatGDI),
00049         PixelFormat32bppRGB = (9 | (32 << 8) | PixelFormatGDI),
00050         PixelFormat32bppARGB = (10 | (32 << 8) | PixelFormatAlpha | PixelFormatGDI | PixelFormatCanonical),
00051         PixelFormat32bppPARGB = (11 | (32 << 8) | PixelFormatAlpha | PixelFormatPAlpha | PixelFormatGDI),
00052         PixelFormat48bppRGB = (12 | (48 << 8) | PixelFormatExtended),
00053         PixelFormat64bppARGB = (13 | (64 << 8) | PixelFormatAlpha | PixelFormatCanonical | PixelFormatExtended),
00054         PixelFormat64bppPARGB = (14 | (64 << 8) | PixelFormatAlpha | PixelFormatPAlpha | PixelFormatExtended),
00055         PixelFormatMax = 15
00056     }

00111         uint CreateImageFromFile(string filename, out IImage image);
00112         // We need the MarshalAs attribute here to keep COM interop from sending the buffer down as a Safe Array.
